item.description: This is super! We should always use contemporary imagery, as I'm sure the ancients did. My sense is that they tried to depict their visions to their audiences in ways that would "bring it home" to them. After all, at bottom -- how express anything erudite unless you express it graphically and tangibly!
item.content:encoded: This is super! We should always use contemporary imagery, as I’m sure the ancients did. My sense is that they tried to depict their visions to their audiences in ways that would “bring it home” to them. After all, at bottom — how express anything erudite unless you express it graphically and tangibly!
